template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a {physical_system} that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a HVAC building system that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

message.content: Optimize the HVAC system's performance by analyzing live data, safely adjusting its parameters, monitoring the results, and reporting the achieved efficiency improvements.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a single-sentence prompt under 40 words for an HVAC optimization task. Let me break down the requirements: analyzing live data, adjusting parameters safely, monitoring results, and reporting improvements. 

I need to make sure all elements are included concisely. Maybe start with the core action—optimize performance—then mention live data analysis, safe parameter adjustment, and wrap up with monitoring and reporting. 

Keeping it under 40 words means trimming any fluff. The current draft hits 27 words and covers all points. The phrasing is straightforward and avoids jargon, which aligns with the "plain-English" request.
